title: Everclear
name: everclear
description: Everclear is a novel public good mechanism for settling intents across chains.
chains_supported: Enables permissionless expansion to new chains and rollups, making it possible for any application on any chain to onboard users from any other chain.
auction_design_details: Race to the Bottom. Auctioneer smart contract governs filler selection (by honoring the bid with the lowest fees).
auction_openness_details: Everclear uses a smart contract for auctions which allows open access for anyone to review the process.
filler_permissionlessness_details: Everclear supports direct integration of filler networks and makes no assumptions about signaling, discovery, matching, or execution of intents. Any filler can participate provided they have sufficient balance stored on-chain.
censorship_resistance_details: While a lot of components including auctioner are on chain, there are still off-chain components that can in theory be censored: Relayers and Cartographer.
filler_failure_resistance_details: If no filler bids, users can increase the fees on their intent. If the winning filler fails to execute within a predefined time window, the intent will be open to any other filler who will take the MAX_FEE as defined by the protocol plus any added fees.
